name: mars-miner-rover
description: A Motherload-inspired 2D rover mining game with Phaser 3

scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:run: npm run android:sync && npx cap run android
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
